entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reconsider EditorForAsync/DisplayForAsync #61438
  • Update src/Security/samples from using Startup to .NET 8 or higher #61437
  • Google/Microsoft authentication does not work behind reverse proxy #61435
  • Multiple Blazor SectionOutlets #61434
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #61432
  • Perf regression: tls-handshakes-httpsys, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61431
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-header-symbols #61430
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted PWA: STATUS_ACCESS_VIOLATION crash when debugging with Visual Studio 2022 17.13.5 and Chromium 135+ #61426
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Warnings about dotnet.runtime.js and dotnet.native.js version mismatch with dotnet.js after publish #61425
    .NET 10 Planning
  • OpenAPI does not generate reference to self when returning arrays in controllers #61424
  • 为什么ASP.NET Core没有英文对应的简体中文注释？ #61423
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #61421
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json_middleware, kestrel-header-symbols #61420

Closed

  • UB Build Failure: aspnetcore - Microsoft.AspNetCore.Runtime.SiteExtension\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net462/win-x86 #61371
  • Consider adding CancellationToken to Hub methods #61409
  • Quarantine InteropTests.InteropTests.EmptyUnary #61291
    Test failures
  • ASP.NET Core add Tag Helpers to replace HTML Helpers such as @Html.DisplayFor #3956
    Backlog
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #61416
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, https #61394
  • Quarantine OpenApiAddURLTests.OpenApi_Add_URL_FileAlreadyExists_Fail & OpenApi_Add_Url_SameName_UniqueFile #61348
    10.0-preview4
  • jsRuntime.InvokeAsync can't return null as Nullable<Guid> #30366
    Backlog
  • Test failure "microsoft.com sub-string not found" in Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.RedirectionTest.RedirectStreamingEnhancedGetToExternal #61175
  • Server-side Blazor Scoped injection is very unhelpful #61174

PullRequests

Created

  • Replaced comparison with -1 w/ equivalent comparison to 0 #61428
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine `EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation` failing tests #61427
    test-failure, area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Sync shared code from runtime #61422
    area-runtime
  • support ForwardedHeaders configuration #61419
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • [Blazor] Use OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Ensure project.assets.json files are unique for SiteExtensions in VMR #61270
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Quarantine some OpenAPI tests #61349
    area-commandlinetools, 10.0-preview4
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Revert "Update .NET build URLs"""" #61400
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Resolve collection for registered services once #61391
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Quarantine: Copy_MultipleSegments #61294
    pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • OpenAPI: merge multiple body content types into one operation #61401
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer warning for using required on DbSet properties #35937
  • IsConcurrencyToken is not working when used in Json owned entity #35934

Closed

  • The same table name in two different schemas #35935
  • WHERE FALSE is added incorrectly #35922
  • Executing query with where clause against a datetime column produces error when c# DateTime.MinValue used #35749
  • Connect to different SQL Databases using efpt.config.json #35923

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Disable Cosmos tests on CI #35933
    ask-mode

Updated

  • Add model building support for complex type collections #35905
  • [release/9.0-staging] Cosmos Full Text Search support (query part) #35909
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.5
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35932

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [IOS] : Having an issue of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps Pin Not able to display for the second opening item in the collection #28918
  • Binding Library - Adding .aar file which should resolve resolution issue but still class is not found. #28916
  • [Windows] GUI temporarily stops responding to mouse cursor, after repeatedly right-clicking to open the context menu (MAUI Blazor Hybrid) #28915
  • [iOS] ListView Cell with ContextActions may not show buttons sometimes #28912
  • [iOS] SetBlur() in canvas is not working #28910
  • Label text looks blurry/pixelated in specific iOS devices and simulators. #28907
  • [Android] .NET 9 Maui - Crash with CreateWindow method - SingleInstance #28906

Closed

  • [Windows] In the Blazor Web View, you can unintentionally drag and drop text into other windows #28917
  • iOS MAUI Build Error: The type 'UIKit.UIInputSuggestion' (used as a parameter in UIKit.UITextView.InsertInputSuggestion) is not available in iOS 18.2 #28913
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Windows]Shell flyout menu missing 😨 when full screen #18611
    Backlog
  • Mixed Content: The page at '<URL>}' was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure XMLHttpRequest endpoint '<URL>'. This request has been blocked; the content must be served over HTTPS. #28748

PullRequests

Created

  • Modernize MediaPicker iOS #28920
    area-essentials, essentials-mediapicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Fix PaddingWithoutSafeArea #28919
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixing #28912 by only hiding context buttons if user ever swiped left #28914
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed ScalingCanvas.SetBlur not working #28911
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [X] Protect some xmlns #28909
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Android - Dynamic Updates to CollectionView Header/Footer and Templates Are Not Displayed #28904
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.6 to 1.6.7 #28903
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml with latest public releases #28922
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28867 #28889
    p/0, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight, .NET 9 SR7
  • Update Versions.props to 9.0.70 SR7 #28900

Updated

  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix for the File.ContentType from MediaPicker not being in valid MIME format #28842
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, essentials-file-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Testing]Fix TappingDoneClosesKeyboard #28668
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
    area-infrastructure
  • [ai] Add release notes prompt #28896
  • Update Test HostApp to not use TableView #28830
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, area-controls-listview
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [XC] add IRootObjectProvider #28310
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed a NullReferenceException when starting application with empty shell on Windows #28879
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage #28844
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Cleanup of `AccessibilityExtensions` #27052
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-general, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed the span text disappeared in label when setting the font attribute on span and setting an implicit style for Label on content page #28851
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fix FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #28884
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was applied to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #28886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed the TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28890
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Start adding the ability to intercept all requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CRef utilizing an operator syntax can resolve against a regular method with matching special name #78103
  • On-the-fly-docs context testing #78102
    17.14
  • Compiler implementation strategy for dictionary expressions targeted to `IReadOnlyDictionary<TKey, TValue>` #78101
  • string initilizer giving compiler error on linux build #78098
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync("My.slnx") #78097
  • Unable to disable analyzer UseExpressionBodyDiagnosticAnalyzer with .editorconfig/globalconfig #78096
  • Roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.WarningsParse testcase is failing on power and x64 with mono. #78095
  • VisualStudioWorkspace.WorkspaceChanged should be replaced with an off-UI-thread solution #78091

Closed

  • Zeroing iterator fields in 17.13 can cause runtime behavior change (new NullReferenceException) #78092
    Next
  • Roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.WarningsParse testcase is failing on power and x64 with mono. #78094

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused test hook #78105
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Project system cleanups #78104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove parameter that was always passed the same constant value #78100
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update targets to reduce syntax tree recreations due to ParseOption changes #78093
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Expression trees: support optional arguments and named arguments in parameter order #77972
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [release/dev17.14] Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #78055
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Field Keyword, 17.14
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #77948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Generate documentation - update API shape #78067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Fix VB tests on MacOSX #78024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement custom awaitable support #78071
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers
  • Move Copilot context provider to EA.Copilot and handler to LanguageServer #77973
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support consumption of instance compound assignment operators #78087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make Razor redirect code more robust #78039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move test helpers to NetLatest #78082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is `InlineArray16<T>` intentionally excluded? #114514
  • Crossgen2 should emit a warning or error when two different versions of the same assembly are referenced #114513
  • [wasm] BrowserLocator.cs' could not be found. #114510
  • Assertion failure g_flsIndex != FLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES #114506
  • Customizing `ApplicationName` during host building breaks User Secrets #114505
  • Crossgen2 composite with JitOptimization causes R2R dump failures on linux #114504
  • GzipStream decompression memory (leak?) lingers in certain environments #114502
  • Excel Automation AddIn fails under .NET6+ #114500
  • Support folding feature switch conditions in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114499
  • [API Proposal]: Add minimal QUERY verb support to HttpClient #114489
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Linq.AsyncEnumerable to allow concurrent operator execution #114478
  • .NET TimeZoneInfo fails to recognize historical invalid times after 2025 tzdb update for America/Asuncion #114476
    Future
  • Update '[GeneratedComInterface]' to emit ILC-friendly vtables for RVA folding #114468
    Future

Closed

  • .NET 9 trimmed application fails with System.TypeLoadException (Method trimmed but interface still listed on type). #109850
    9.0.x
  • Request: make lttng-ust an optional build dependency #107406
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Custom the dotnet runtime root folder path #64430
    10.0.0
  • Create cDAC entrypoint same as DAC `CLRDataCreateInstance` #112583
    10.0.0
  • Use-cases for Swift interop in .NET 10 #95636
    10.0.0
  • Projection tooling for Swift interop in .NET 10 #95633
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/mcc/interop/mcc_i03/mcc_i03.cmd #108640
    10.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler retries with useless "Authorization" header when SystemNetworkCredential is in use #113145
    Future
  • .NET 6+ WebSocket HttpListener - memory leak #101022
    10.0.0
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DataFlow failure #114465
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #114445
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/dynamicoptimization/DynamicOptimization/DynamicOptimization.cmd #114314
    10.0.0
  • Raise the `AppDomain.UnhandledException` event for exceptions outside the runtime. #102730
    10.0.0
  • Setting Thread.Name before Start() not working on macOS #106464
    Future
  • Improve code coverage for System.Xml.Schema #20411
  • how can make the release directory look a little more refreshing #111324
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove setting `$ORIGIN/netcoredeps` rpath #114512
    area-Host
  • Use the regular build scripts for -vs coreclr.sln #114511
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #114509
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update Microsoft.NETCore.CoreDisTools nuget package from 1.4 to 1.5 #114507
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #114498
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Reduce string interpolation overhead #114497
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use NOTIFY_ON_U2M_TRANSITIONS in SfiInit/SfiNext #114496
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add internal intrinsics for instance-based calli #114495
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Replace OptimizedInboxTextEncoder vectorization with SearchValues #114494
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataModule APIs SOS uses to read line numbers #114491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove a few more unsafe code from STJ #114490
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe
  • [RISC-V] Move lower 11 bits of indirection address to load / store offset #114488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify handling `Span` in the cctor interpreter #114487
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix IsVNConstantBound assert #114486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MLDsaOpenSsl + tests #114485
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Place read-only non-GC static bases into read-only section #114477
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Force storing GC state until we see a labeled IG #114475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Print load immediate value in disassembly #114470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [android] Add -keepnativesymbols to Windows build #114466
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support to add new FieldRVAs to EnC #114463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix broken System.Runtime.sln #114503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add convert aliases #114501
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Add missing referenced file #114508
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #110098
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable jit optimization in crossgen testing #114464
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make CertificateRequest et al work with ML-DSA #114471
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Make lttng-ust an optional dependency. #113876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add Sqrt packedsimd alias #114493
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][interp] Filter out overmatched shift #114492
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Share common Uri redaction logic in Http #114483
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][bench] Fix the template dir creation #114482
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] remove dead code #114479
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix link to documentation file #114481
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Remove unsafe code from WinHttpHandler TryGetHeaderName helper #114484
    area-System.Net.Http, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • [browser] profiler cleanup #114480
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Reduce unsafe from STJ #114154
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe
  • Fix for "ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: _Uaarch64_setcontext" when doing build for FreeBSD-arm64 using internal libunwind #110432
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore DefaultCredentials when doing Basic & Digest auth in SocketsHttpHandler #113728
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [clr-interp] Add github notifications for code owners #114367
    needs-area-label
  • Dev/rokonec/101022 httplistner mem leak #114098
    area-System.Net
  • ILLink : Fix and a couple tweaks #114215
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Name native threads before start (macOS/Native AOT) #114249
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix GC hole with `rorx` instruction #114467

    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

  • Add `InlineArray16<T>` #114515

    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • fix: in rsa signatures, configure digest before padding mode #114261
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix stack overflow caused by very deep parent/child Task chains #113407
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtimelab/feature/async2-experiment` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #2723
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Implement correct memory handling in C# bindings #2851
  • [Swift language features] Improve `MarshalToSwift` to track size of buffer in parameter #2974
  • [Swift language features] Revisit thread safety of ref counting in projections #2975
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Implement Swift payload as SafeHandler to decouple IDisposable from the bindings #3018

Updated

  • Projection tooling features for Swift interop #3071

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge feb25 #2993
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [RuntimeAsync] Remove new OSR transition helper #3080
    area-async
  • [RuntimeAsync] Porting fixes from the merge PR #3078
    area-async
  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from upstream #3079
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UB Build Failure: sdk - Workloads build producing same versions as emsdk build #48360
  • The SDK should provide a RID-negotiation Task for other tools to use #48352
  • A broken Template #48349
  • SourceLink creates incomplete URLs for GitHub Enterprise #48348

Closed

  • Consider basic support for launchSettings for the new dotnet test #47548

PullRequests

Created
